channel.title: How to enable SMT and SMP?
channel.description: Hi, How do I enable SMT and SMP for my Intel Processor server? I have latest BIOS updated, does that mean I am immunity to Meltdown and Spectre and safe to enable SMT? I need both of my processors to be working, I need SMP to be enabled. Thank you!

item.title: How to enable SMT and SMP?
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Hi,
How do I enable SMT and SMP for my Intel Processor server?
I have latest BIOS updated, does that mean I am immunity to Meltdown and Spectre and safe to enable SMT?
I need both of my processors to be working, I need SMP to be enabled.
Thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: How to enable SMT and SMP?
